original_text: And when thou preparest a bullock for a burnt offering, or for a sacrifice in performing a vow, or peace offerings unto the Lord:
korean_text: 번제로나 서원을 갚는 제사로나 화목제로 수송아지를 예비하여 여호와께 드릴 때에는

sentences.original_text: And when thou preparest a bullock for a burnt offering,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 네가 번제물로 수송아지를 준비할 때에,

sentences.original_text: or for a sacrifice in performing a vow,
or peace offerings unto the Lord:
